name: Pegu Club
description: The Pegu Club is a remarkable and deceptive cocktail. Seemingly a simple mix of gin, lime juice, and orange curaçao, the drink has a flavor that is given robust depth by the addition of two styles of bitters. Rich, tart, and crisp at the same time, the Pegu Club has enamored countless cocktail geeks over the past decade--and while there are several recipes for this drink floating around, they're all variations on the same theme.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, and fill with ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
